subject: RE: [junit] Assert as a keyword in JDK1.4 Beta 2
msgSnippet: Use JUnit 3.7 and assertTrue(...). Donald Holliday ... From: Anshuman [mailto:amoni@verilytics.com] Sent: Thursday, October 18, 2001 12:55 AM To:
messageBody:
Use JUnit 3.7 and assertTrue(...).
 

Donald Holliday
-----Original Message-----
From: Anshuman [mailto:amoni@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 18, 2001 12:55 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Assert as a keyword in JDK1.4 Beta 2
Importance: High

Hi !,
 
    In JDK 1.4.0 Beta 2 verion, assert is a keyword. Has any one looked into this ? Is there any proposed changes for the JUnit assert method ? How will a code for the unit testing written using JUnit be compatible with the JDK1.4 version ?
 
 
-ASM
